Activity: Wake up, check calendar for the day.
Log in to the system, check emails, and respond to important requests.
Focus on researching news sentiment data. Explore different providers and their methodologies for sentiment scoring.
Evaluate the accuracy and reliability of the news sentiment data. Compare sentiment scores from different providers.
Design data cleaning procedures for the news sentiment data. Handle different text formats, languages, and potential biases.

Implement a data cleaning script for the news sentiment data. Remove irrelevant information and standardize the data format.
Integrate the cleaned news sentiment data with the stock price and macroeconomic data. Align the data based on timestamps and company identifiers.
Test the integrated dataset and evaluate its quality. Identify any data inconsistencies or alignment issues.
Refine the data integration process based on the testing results. Incorporate data validation checks and error handling.
